hero.deposit: Manage any local currency anywhere across Africa.
hero.OneWallet: One wallet for all your local currency needs.
hero.secureAnd: Secure and fast exchange and payment wallet.
hero.cashout: Cashout in local currency anywhere easily
hero.paragra1: You can now travel across Africa without worrying about exchanging from one local currency to another. You can keep more of the value of your money in any local currency.
hero.install: Just scan or tap on whatsapp

description.text1: "You can deposit or send in CFA, Naira or Cedi into your wallet and cashout RWF in Rwanda, Shilling in Kenya Or Kwacha in Zambia."

body.one: Deposit and cashout into/from your wallet directly using any mobile money network or via a local Agent.
body.two: We are always adding more currencies to cover the rest of Africa. So don't be sad if yours is not yet there.
body.three: Get a detailed history of every operation you perform on the wallet. We make sure your funds don't escape.
body.four: Use your wallet balance to purchase online in any local currency. A true wallet should serve you anywhere.

conviction.text: Making your money available when you need it the most.
conviction.text2: We have designed a simple wallet that will allow you deposit your money in a currency of your choice and also withdraw cash in the currency of your choice at low fees and direct exchange rates.

visit.text1: Ready to visit your next African country?.

descriptionApp.text1: The wallet service is fully accessible via our chatbot.
